source_reference.text: How to Fight Less  (Christian/Bible) (Video by ApplyGodsWord.com/Mark Ballenger)

content_summary:
How to fight less with your spouse and how to fight less in a relationship. We talk about 4 ways to fight less in marriage and in dating relationships by offering a biblical and Christian perspective. 

http://applygodsword.com/

#Christianmarriageadvice, #Christianvlog, #Christianmarriage,
